Trade/Device Name(s): UniCel DxC SYNCHRON Systems Hemoglobin A1c- (HbA1c-) Reagent
Regulation Name(s): Calibrator for Hemoglobin or hematocrit measurement
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for UniCel DxC SYNCHRON Systems Hemoglobin A1c- Reagent for quantitative measurement of HbA1c in whole blood using turbidimetric immunoinhibition and colorimetric methods
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative determination of hemoglobin A1c concentration in human whole blood, used for long-term glycemic control monitoring in patients with diabetes mellitus
